sircovid 0.2.32

Grid search of beta and start date

scan_beta_date.Rd

Run a grid search of the particle filter over beta and start date. This is parallelised, first run plan(multiprocess) to set this up.

scan_beta_date(
  min_beta,
  max_beta,
  beta_step,
  first_start_date,
  last_start_date,
  day_step,
  data,
  sircovid_model = basic_model(),
  model_params,
  pars_obs,
  n_particles = 100,
  scale_prior = NULL,
  shape_prior = NULL,
  tolerance = 1e-10
)

Arguments

min_beta

Minimum value of beta in the search
max_beta

Maximum value of beta in the search
beta_step

Step to increment beta between min and max
first_start_date

Earliest start date as 'yyyy-mm-dd'
last_start_date

Latest start date as 'yyyy-mm-dd'
day_step

Step to increment date in days
data

Hosptial data to fit to. See example.csv and particle_filter_data()
sircovid_model

An odin model generator and comparison function.
model_params

Model parameters, from a call to generate_parameters()
pars_obs

list of parameters to use for the comparison function.
n_particles

Number of particles. Positive Integer. Default = 100
scale_prior

Set to use a gamma prior on beta, and report the posterior rather than the likelihood. Sets scale of gamma prior.
shape_prior

Set to use a gamma prior on beta, and report the posterior rather than the likelihood. Sets shape of gamma prior.
tolerance

The smallest difference from 0 that is acceptable in the probability matrix.

Value

List of beta and start date grid values, and normalised probabilities at each point

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
